nodes.text: The Mental boost D-package greatly enhanced the impulses in the neural network of the brain so as to give a significant increase in all mental attributes, making it the most valuable implant of its type. The technology of D-Package implants had the consequence of rendering them larger and more intrusive than other types. Thus, they tended to have more impressive effects, but could only be used by very healthy individuals.
In the game, the playable character must have a constitution attribute of 18 or higher.
